properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Amefufuka Yesu - Tuimbe Alleluya
Ni Mwana wake Mungu
Tuimbe Aleluya.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Aleluya, Mwokozi wa dunia,
Aleluya amefufuka mzima
Amefufuka yesu,
Tuimbe aleluya.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Amefufuka Bwana - Tuimbe aleluya
Kaburi liko wazi - Tuimbe aleluya

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Aliyesulibiwa - Tuimbe aleluya
Kwa enzi kafufuka - Tuimbe aleluya

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ubao wa msalaba - Tuimbe aleluya
Furaha umeleta - Tuimbe aleluya

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Mtumishi wake Mungu - Tuimbe aleluya
Atatukuzwa sana - Tuimbe aleluya

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Mwana Kondoo wetu - Tuimbe aleluya
Sadaka amechinjwa - Tuimbe aleluya

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Tuile karamuye - Tuimbe aleluya
Kwa shangwe tumwimbie - Tuimbe aleluya.
